DOC.brief_summary: The Advance® 18 PTX® Balloon Catheter study clinical trial study safety effectiveness Advance 18® PTX® Balloon Catheter treatment lesion superficial femoral artery popliteal artery .
DOC.criteria: Key Age > 18 year . Able provide inform consent . Has least one de novo restenotic lesion ( ) > 70 % stenosis document angiographically SFA popliteal artery . If one lesion require intervention , one treat study lesion . Key Has significant stenosis ( > 50 % ) occlusion inflow tract ( proximal ipsilateral , iliofemoral , aortic lesion ) successfully treated procedure . Lack least one patent runoff vessel < 50 % stenosis throughout course . Lesions target area require atherectomy ( ablative device ) , cut balloon , cryoplasty balloon , advanced device facilitate angioplasty balloon stent delivery .
